entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as hurrying toward them all, looking anxious. He was unshaven and still in his day clothes; there was also a slightly Mundungu-like whiff of stale drink about him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as being helped up by Sirius. She is staring at Harry along with the twins.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as saying 'Ask Harry'.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as saying 'Yeah, I want to hear this for myself.'

entities.name: phineas nigellus
entities.description: Phineas Nigellus is mentioned as the one who said Arthur's been badly injured.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is mentioned as being badly injured according to Phineas Nigellus.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher's footsteps are mentioned as stopping on the stairs outside.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a vision and telling them all about it.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as someone Harry had to tell about his vision.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Harry had to tell about his vision.

relationships.description: Fred asked Harry to tell them what was going on.
George wanted to hear from Harry himself.
Phineas Nigellus said Arthur's been badly injured.
Harry had a vision of Kreacher, but it is not clear if he saw him directly or through the snake's eyes.
Harry told McGonagall about his vision.
Harry told Dumbledore about his vision.
